wikipedia_page.main: Steve Young (January 6, 1953 – January 9, 2003) was national president of the Fraternal Order of Police in 2001.

response: Steve Young (born 1961) is a retired American football quarterback and member of the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
Steve Young or Steven Young may also refer to:
*Steve Young (musician) (1942–2016), country music singer, songwriter and guitarist
*Steve Young (Alberta politician), politician in the Canadian province of Alberta
*Steve Young (basketball) ("Steve Giatzoglou"), Greek-American professional basketball player
*Steve Young (Washington politician), former mayor of Kennewick, Washington

The national organization has three offices: the Labor Services Division in Columbus, Ohio, the Steve Young Law Enforcement Legislative Advocacy Center in Washington, D.C., and the Grand Lodge "Atnip-Orms Center" National Headquarters in Nashville, Tennessee."Contact Us ." Fraternal Order of Police.
*Steve Young Law Enforcement Legislative Advocacy Center (Legislative lobby)
*Steve Young, 50, American national president of the Fraternal Order of Police.
